title: Learning Path: Lumen noise
ai_summary: The user is experiencing visual artifacts or graininess in their Unreal Engine 5 project when using Lumen global illumination.
ai_what_you_learn: Increase the Lumen Scene Lighting Quality in Project Settings to 'High' or 'Epic' for improved visual fidelity but at a higher performance cost.
Adjust the 'Final Gather Quality' and 'Final Gather Max Ray Distance' in the Post Process Volume settings to reduce noise, balancing quality and performance.
Experiment with the 'Screen Percentage' setting; increasing it can reduce noise, but significantly impacts performance.
Use Temporal Anti-Aliasing (TAA) with high-quality settings and consider enabling 'TAA Gen5' if supported by your hardware for better noise reduction.
